Notes.Text:
This update for raptor fixes the following issues:

- Fixed a heap overflow vulnerability (bsc#1178593, CVE-2017-18926).
Notes.Title: Details

Relationships.RelatesToProductReference: SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Desktop Applications 15 SP2
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Desktop Applications 15 SP2
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Desktop Applications 15 SP2

Vulnerabilities.Description: raptor_xml_writer_start_element_common in raptor_xml_writer.c in Raptor RDF Syntax Library 2.0.15 miscalculates the maximum nspace declarations for the XML writer, leading to heap-based buffer overflows (sometimes seen in raptor_qname_format_as_xml).
